name: Big Fan
description: A hard-core New York Giants fan struggles to deal with the consequences when he is beaten up by his favorite player.

review.author: 13Funbags
review.heading: You don't have to like sports to enjoy this movie.
review.reviewBody: I never knew this movie existed until Howard Stern mentioned it on his show last week. I'm glad he did because this was a good movie. Patton Oswalt is once again type-cast as the geeky guy who lives with his mom except this time he's a huge football fan. Michael Rappaport basically just plays himself, a mean spirited jerk, and Kevin Corrigan is once again type-cast as the barely noticeable, somewhat supportive best friend. Despite the three main actors not stretching at all for this movie, it still works somehow. Though I must say that Satan from Your Pretty Face Is Going To Hell was disappointing as the police detective. This is definitely a movie you should see.

keywords: dark humor,man wears underwear,adult child lives at home,new york giants football,new york city
